survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Sustainable Coffee Brands Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and behaviors regarding sustainable coffee brands, including purchasing habits, brand awareness, and factors influencing their choices.

questions.question_text: How often do you purchase sustainable coffee brands?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure the options cover all possible frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you purchase sustainable coffee brands?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors most influence your decision to purchase sustainable coffee? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following factors most influence your decision to purchase sustainable coffee? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' to Q1.

questions.question_text: What is the maximum price premium you are willing to pay for sustainable coffee compared to conventional coffee?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure the options are clear and cover a realistic range of price premiums.

script.question_text: What is the maximum price premium you are willing to pay for sustainable coffee compared to conventional coffee?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' to Q1.

questions.question_text: Please name any sustainable coffee brands you are aware of or have purchased in the past.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to allow respondents to list brands freely.

script.question_text: Please name any sustainable coffee brands you are aware of or have purchased in the past.

questions.question_text: What improvements would encourage you to purchase sustainable coffee more frequently?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered 'Occasionally' or 'Never' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to gather qualitative insights. This can help identify barriers and opportunities.

script.question_text: What improvements would encourage you to purchase sustainable coffee more frequently?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered 'Occasionally' or 'Never' to Q1.
